CHarrisCornerFilter

Defines an image filter for computing Harris corners in an image

Image Filter Parameters

None

Functions
Apply
CRefObj<IImage> CHarrisCornerFilter::Apply(
IImage* pImage,
ImageFilterParams* pParams
)

Detects Harris corners in an image and returns an image with the marked corners

Parameters
pImage
IImage*

image to perform filtering on. Must be 32bpp image.

pParams
ImageFilterParams*

filter parameters.

Returns

Returns the marked image.

CreateMedian

Creates a filter that performs median filtering on an image.

Returns

Returns the newly created filter.
